description: This file defines the main cart page component for a Next.js e-commerce frontend. It manages user cart display, handles checkout process, and provides links for login and shopping continuation.

methods.name: CartPage
methods.description: Main React component for the shopping cart page, managing cart items, checkout, and user interactions.

methods.name: onCheckout
methods.description: Async function to handle checkout process, managing checkout state and error handling.
